title.rendered: UnitedLex collaborates with Smile Foundation by supporting Mission Education Programme

content.rendered:
uNITEDLEX collaborates with Smile Foundation by supporting its MISSION EDUCATION programme

 UnitedLex has joined hands with Smile Foundation to make a difference in the lives of 400 underprivileged children in Noida, Uttar Pradesh, and Bengaluru, Karnataka. The primary goal is to provide these children with quality education, focusing on enhancing their learning levels and overall development through both academic and co-curricular activities.

The initiative strives to create an interactive and enjoyable learning environment, where children can explore interesting and meaningful activities that enhance their learning capabilities. Besides academics, the program also includes sessions on WASH (Water, Sanitation, and Hygiene) and Life skills, aiming to encourage positive behaviors and habits at home and within the community. The ultimate vision is to empower these children to become ‘Change Agents’ who inspire positive changes in their surroundings.
